title: Domain-Specific Usability of LLMs in Medical Applications
description: Assess the usability of LLMs in domain-specific medical applications, focusing on their ability to provide accurate and explainable clinical recommendations.
motivation: General LLMs often struggle with domain-specific tasks, such as medical applications. Evaluating their usability in these contexts can lead to more effective and reliable medical tools.
questions: How effective are LLMs in improving the accuracy of clinical recommendations when applied to specific medical domains such as cardiology, oncology, and pediatrics?
What are the primary challenges and limitations of LLMs in providing explainable recommendations for complex medical cases, and how do these challenges vary across different medical specialties?
In what ways do user perceptions of the usability and trustworthiness of LLM-generated clinical recommendations differ between healthcare professionals and patients in various medical fields?
